header.title: Generate API Demo Guide
header.subtitle: You can run the demo directly from the shop detail page, and follow the steps below to implement it easily in an embed context.

steps.title: 1. Issue access token
steps.detail: Send email and password to the login endpoint (/api/login/) to receive access and refresh tokens.

steps.title: 2. Register a shop
steps.detail: Send shop_id, shop_name, company_name, business_registration_number, contact_phone to /api/shops/ with the issued access token in the Authorization header.

steps.title: 3. Call Generate
steps.detail: Bundle shop_id, customer_id, person_image, product_image in FormData and POST to /api/generate/ to receive a PNG binary response.

codeSection.title: Sample code
codeSection.subtitle: Example that collects a product image and a customer photo on an embed button click and sends a Generate request.

tipSection.title: Tips
items: A Generate request typically takes around 10 seconds. Show a spinner or progress to inform users while waiting.
We currently use a dummy product image. When connected to your shop API, place the real image in the same FormData field.
Passing a customer identifier via customer_id helps you tie the generated image back to your order flow.
